title: Americans Scared to Outlive Their Assets: BlackRock's Magyera
description: BlackRock Head of US Wealth Advisory and Head of Retirement Jaime Magyera joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss retirement planning, BlackRock's target date funds and other retirement investment vehicles, and more. Magyera says that more Americans are "scared of outliving their assets than dying" and also discusses the so-called 'Great Wealth Transfer' between men and women amid US population and demographic changes. Magyera speaks with Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
